name: address
description: The addresses of locations where organizations operate.

id.name: id
id.title: Identifier
id.description: The identifier of the postal address. Each postal address must have a unique identifier.

location_id.name: location_id
location_id.title: Location Identifier
location_id.description: The identifier of the location for this postal address.

address_1.name: address_1
address_1.title: Address line 1
address_1.description: The first line(s) of the address, including office, building number and street.

city.name: city
city.title: City
city.description: The city in which the address is located.

region.name: region
region.title: Region
region.description: The region in which the address is located (optional).

state_province.name: state_province
state_province.title: State Or Province
state_province.description: The state or province in which the address is located.

postal_code.name: postal_code
postal_code.title: Postal Code
postal_code.description: The postal code for the address.

country.name: country
country.title: Country
country.description: The country in which the address is located. This should be given as an ISO 3361-1 country code (two letter abbreviation).

address_type.name: address_type
address_type.title: Address Type
address_type.description: The type of address which may be physical, postal, or virtual.

cityCode.name: cityCode
cityCode.title: City code
cityCode.description: The city code when applicable. In France it's the INSEE code.
